contents.title: Our Mission:
contents.description: To propel Africa's prosperity by connecting its people, cultures, and markets.

contents.title: Our Vision:
contents.description: To be Africa's preferred and sustainable aviation group.

contents.title: Principles of the Integrity Code:
contents.description: Conflict of Interest, Gifts and Entertainment, Ethical Marketing, Safeguarding, Competition Law, Anti-Bribery and Anti-Corruption, Act Right Speak Up, Preventing Criminal Financing Activities, Extrenal Activities, Company Assets
